availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Holeman R. Crow (Jessamine County, Kentucky, livery keeper)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, livery keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth. Father of Mary J. Crow, Bettie Crow, Maggie Crow, and William Crow. Livery keeper in Jessamine County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Nicholasville, p. 116.
Find A Grave, "Holman R. Crow (July 26, 1816-Jan 13, 1893)," Memorial #108051578, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/108051578 (accessed May 16, 2020).
